content:

author: metachris_
content:
Exactly, that's also our line of thinking. The relays can't force transactions onto builders, but it could filter out bids that don't match the proposers preferences (and include merkle proofs for inclusion as part of the getHeader response). 

Replied to the issue with a bit more details.
